sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {ListGroup, Card, Button, Container} from 'react-bootstrap'; import mino from '../assets/mino.png'; import mino2 from '../assets/mino-copy.png'; export class ProductList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { hover: false }; } render() { return ( this.setState({hover: true})} onMouseOut={() => this.setState({hover: false})} /> Denumire produs Pret produs Denumire produs Pret produs Denumire produs Pret produs Denumire produs Pret produs Denumire produs Pret produs Denumire produs Pret produs Denumire produs Pret produs ) } }
